routines.title: Morning Energizer
routines.description: A quick routine to wake up your body and mind. Perfect to jumpstart your day.

steps.name: Neck Rolls
steps.instruction: Roll your neck slowly in a full circle, first clockwise then counterclockwise, to release tension and increase mobility.

steps.name: Shoulder Circles
steps.instruction: Rotate your shoulders in wide circles forward and backward to loosen up tension.

steps.name: Torso Twists
steps.instruction: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart and gently twist your torso side to side to activate your spine and core.

routines.title: Desk Break
routines.description: Relieve stiffness and boost circulation with this quick mid-workday reset.

steps.name: Seated Shoulder Rolls
steps.instruction: While seated, roll your shoulders forward and backward to reduce tension from typing or poor posture.

steps.name: Wrist Stretches
steps.instruction: Extend one arm and gently pull back on your fingers with the other hand to stretch your wrists and forearms.

steps.name: Standing Forward Bend
steps.instruction: Stand up and slowly bend forward, letting your arms hang toward the ground to decompress your spine.

routines.title: Full Body Flow
routines.description: A comprehensive routine for improving mobility and flexibility.

steps.name: Neck Rolls
steps.instruction: Gently roll your neck in a circle to release tightness and improve range of motion.

steps.name: Shoulder Circles
steps.instruction: Move your shoulders forward and back in circular motions to warm up.

steps.name: Hamstring Stretch
steps.instruction: Bend forward with legs straight and reach for your toes to lengthen your hamstrings.

steps.name: Quad Stretch
steps.instruction: Stand tall and pull one foot toward your glutes to stretch the front of your thigh.

routines.title: Post-Workout Recovery
routines.description: A cooldown sequence to help muscles recover and reduce soreness.

steps.name: Chest Opener
steps.instruction: Stand or kneel, interlace your fingers behind you and lift your arms slightly to stretch the chest.

steps.name: Back Stretch
steps.instruction: Gently arch your back while on all fours or standing to stretch your spine.

steps.name: Leg Stretch
steps.instruction: Sit and reach toward your toes with both legs extended to loosen your hamstrings and calves.

routines.title: Evening Wind Down
routines.description: A calming routine to help your body unwind before bed.

steps.name: Gentle Neck Stretches
steps.instruction: Slowly tilt your head side to side, forward and back, holding each stretch to relieve tension.

steps.name: Shoulder Shrugs
steps.instruction: Lift and drop your shoulders in a relaxed motion to release daily tension.

steps.name: Calm Breathing
steps.instruction: Breathe in through your nose for 4 seconds, hold for 4, and exhale slowly through your mouth for 4.

routines.title: Flexibility Booster
routines.description: Dynamic stretches to expand your range of motion.

steps.name: Dynamic Leg Swings
steps.instruction: Swing your legs front to back with control to open up your hips.

steps.name: Side Lunges
steps.instruction: Lunge side to side to stretch the inner thighs and improve lateral movement.

steps.name: Hip Circles
steps.instruction: With hands on your hips, rotate your hips in full circles to increase mobility.

routines.title: Stress Relief Routine
routines.description: Unwind after a long day with this relaxing sequence.

steps.name: Deep Breathing
steps.instruction: Breathe deeply and slowly, focusing on your breath to reduce anxiety and center yourself.

steps.name: Seated Forward Bend
steps.instruction: Sit tall, extend your legs, and gently bend forward, reaching for your toes while relaxing your back.

steps.name: Mindful Stretch
steps.instruction: Gently stretch your arms and torso while staying present and relaxed.

routines.title: Yoga Flow
routines.description: Improve strength and flexibility with a flowing yoga routine.

steps.name: Cat-Cow Stretch
steps.instruction: On all fours, alternate between arching and rounding your back in sync with your breath.

steps.name: Downward Dog
steps.instruction: Form an inverted V, pressing your hands and feet into the ground and lifting your hips up.

steps.name: Child's Pose
steps.instruction: Kneel down and stretch your arms forward while relaxing your torso toward the ground.

steps.name: Warrior II
steps.instruction: Step into a wide lunge and stretch your arms out horizontally while keeping your gaze over the front hand.

routines.title: Active Break
routines.description: A quick, energizing burst of movement anytime you feel sluggish.

steps.name: Jumping Jacks
steps.instruction: Jump and move your arms overhead, landing with feet apart, then return to center in a rhythm.

steps.name: Arm Circles
steps.instruction: Make wide forward and backward circles with your arms to engage the shoulders.

steps.name: High Knees
steps.instruction: Lift your knees toward your chest one at a time while pumping your arms for added cardio.

routines.title: Yoga Stretch & Relax
routines.description: End your day or workout with these calming, full-body yoga stretches.

steps.name: Mountain Pose
steps.instruction: Stand tall with feet together, arms by your sides, and breathe deeply to center yourself.

steps.name: Tree Pose
steps.instruction: Balance on one foot and place the other foot on your inner thigh or calf, hands together at your chest.

steps.name: Seated Twist
steps.instruction: Sit tall and twist your torso to one side while keeping your hips grounded, then switch sides.
